name: Mechana
description:
Mechana is an early prototype of a vehicle building and battling game. Current gameplay features build mode and sandbox mode. A basic assortment of parts are available including wheels, tracks, wings, and walker legs. Players can design their own vehicles and test them out in sandbox against a handful of AI enemies.

This is a game I've worked on for fun in my free time. I'd like the get the multiplayer running next so people can play against each other. I am aware there are some other games out there that have already explored the territory Mechana enters. While I enjoyed some parts of those games, I have my own vision for Mechana and do not intend to simply recreate every aspect of them.
